title: THE MIRROR
oneline: An audiovisual immersive cinema performance by People Like Us
bio: "A feat of research and craft, this new work is a spellbinding inquiry into editing and juxtaposition; a collage one can unthread allowing the viewer to discover hidden stories through familiar images. The soundtrack is performed live, made up from hundreds of preexisting songs, as well as particular sounds from the original film clips." â€” Flatpack Film Festival
